name: Minimize
effect: The first time this move is used in combat, Increase the User's Evasion by 2 (subsequent uses instead increase the User's Evasion by 1). If the User rolls a Critical Strike with this move, Increase the User's Special or remove one negative Stat Change (instead of the normal bonus for a Critical Strike).
description: The Pokemon compacts its body, appearing smaller than its normal size.
